name: Dong Wen 0001
content: DWDr. DONG WENSchool of Computer Science and EngineeringUniversity of New South WalesSydney NSW 2052, Australiadong.wen@unsw.edu.auAbout Me I am currently a Senior Lecturer and an ARC DECRA fellow in the Data and Knowledge Research Group, the School of Computer Science and Engineering, the University of New South Wales (UNSW), Australia. I received my Ph.D. degree from the University of Technology Sydney (UTS) and my Bachelor degree from the Nankai University.We are recruiting self-motivated MPhil and PhD students. Send me an email with your CV and transcript if you would like to pursue a research degree (PhD and MPhil) in the area of Big Data analytics and Database. PhD scholarship with tuition fee waiver will be provided to outstanding applicants.Research InterestsBig Data ProcessingDistributed Algorithms; I/O Efficient Algorithms; GPU Acceleration; Database SystemsGraph MiningGraph Neural Networks; Scalable Graph Processing; AI4DB & DB4AISelected Conference PapersK.
